workflow_name: User Story to Task Contract Creation

activities.activity_name: Parse user story and extract requirements
activities.notes: Task-Definition-Agent reads user story, identifies capabilities, constraints. Human-Lead has veto power.
Task-Definition-Agent drafts ACs, consults Product-Owner for business logic, Task-Testing for testability. Human approves.
Task-Definition-Agent fills 6-dimension template, consults Ontology-Advisor if unclear. Human-Lead validates completeness.

activities.activity_name: Design test strategy and list required tests
activities.notes: Task-Testing-Agent proposes test approach (unit/integration/e2e), Task-Definition includes in contract.

activities.activity_name: Assign RACI roles for task execution
activities.notes: Task-Definition-Agent suggests RACI assignments (e.g., R=DB-Specialist, A=Human-Lead), Human approves.
Cultural-Steward reviews task contract for punitive language, ensures 3-attempt limit, return-task option visible.

activities.activity_name: Final review and approval of task contract
activities.notes: Human-Lead makes final decision. Has veto power over any aspect of task contract.

phase_0_notes: In Phase 0, Human-Lead is Accountable for ALL activities. This ensures learning and oversight. In Phase 1+, some accountability may delegate to autonomous agents (e.g., Cultural-Steward becomes Accountable for sanctuary culture validation).
